name: oat seed production, for sowing | oat seed, for sowing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15857/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of oat seed (fresh weight), with a maximum water content of 15%, at regional storehouse.;This process is identical to the ecoinvent process 'wheat seed production, Swiss integrated production, for sowing' which is used as a proxy for oat seed production at regional storehouse. This dataset refers to an average situation; for specific situations exchanges might differ substantially due to site specific parameters

The activity starts after harvest.

The seed is processed in the processing centre, treated (pre-cleaning, cleaning, eventually drying, chemical dressing (for integrated production) and bag filling), stored and afterwards transported to the regional storage centre. No data on wastewater production were available.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0164:Seed processing for propagation

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period referring to the data source: 1999-2002. Based on expert opinion data is considered to be valid at least up to 2012.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Production of imported seed is approximated by seed produced in Switzerland. This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on a literature, expert information and enquiry of seed processing plants.

exchanges.description: Related to the building used for seed cleaning

Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of oat seed, for sowing is calculated to be circa 1.00E-04 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: 'diphenylether-compound'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 2.00E-04 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.
